ThingDef.label: diamond slime
ThingDef.description: A green slime, most at home in leafy jungles.

ThingDef.label: diamond slime egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized diamond slime egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby diamond slime. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
